author: gstein
msg: Tease out some more meaning of the COPIED flag for schedule-delete nodes.
I'm really going to kill whoever "designed" this. Eesh...
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries): write a treatise on the definition of the COPIED flag in
the schedule-delete block, and then jigger in a few more flags to
support those definitions.

author: gstein
msg: If we pass an Entry object around, outside the originating hash, then it
is handy to have the name inside the thing. Make it so.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/entries-dump.c:
(entries_dump): set the e.name field with the entry's name

author: hwright
msg: Change a check to an assert.  The docstring to this API says that
adm_access must be valid, so instead ignoring it and trunkin' right
along if it isn't, fail immediately.  This prevents a possible
NULL pointer dereference further down the stack.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(svn_wc_status2): Assert an argument, rather than just checking it.

author: blair
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(switch_file_external):
Formatting fix.

author: hwright
msg: Remove some dead code.
* subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(switch_file_external): We don't generate any errors between this check and
the one before it, so don't bother checking the error again.
